subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Forwards Robbie Keane of the Los Angeles Galaxy, Mike Magee of the Chicago Fire and Marco Di Vaio of the Montreal Impact are the finalists for Major League Soccer’s Most Valuable Player award.
snippet: Forwards Robbie Keane of the Los Angeles Galaxy, Mike Magee of the Chicago Fire and Marco Di Vaio of the Montreal Impact are the finalists for Major League Soccer’s Most Valuable Player award.
